title: Who are Illuminati and what do they control? - Quora

response.answer_text: Love… Exciting and new…. Come aboard… We’re expecting you… Illuminati Soon will be making another run… Illuminati Promises something for everyone… Set your course for adventure, Your mind on a new romance… And love won’t hurt any more… A large enough dose of Oxycontin And you will hit the floor… With love… Welcome aboard… it’s loooo… oooo… ve! [Apologies, I was busy in the office, and the song came on…]
